src/lib/data/index.ts.description: Entity linkage status updates are persisted using localStorage via updateEntityLinkage method. This is a temporary solution until a Rust backend command is implemented. The storage key is 'entity-linkage-updates'.

src/components/analysis/entity-graph-vie.description: EntityGraphViewer is an SVG-based graph visualization component for entity relationships. Uses EntityGraphData from entity-resolution.ts engine. Props: graphData (required), onNodeClick (optional callback), selectedNodeId (optional). Entity types are color-coded: professional=bronze, person=blue, organization=amber, court=red. Follows NetworkGraph.tsx visual patterns with framer-motion animations.

src/__tests__/e2e/entity-resolution-work.description: End-to-end entity resolution workflow test suite covering: document upload, entity extraction with Compromise NLP, fuzzy matching linkages (5+ name variations), UI confirmation via React hooks, graph updates, and database persistence. Uses mock documents with realistic legal content (social worker reports, expert witness statements, court hearing notes) containing entities like SW Thompson, Dr. Grant, Judge Williams with multiple name variations.
